QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.drug_exposure_id , t.person_id , t.drug_concept_id , t.drug_exposure_start_date , t.drug_exposure_start_datetime , t.drug_exposure_end_date , t.drug_exposure_end_datetime , t.verbatim_end_date , t.drug_type_concept_id , t.stop_reason , t.refills , t.quantity , t.days_supply , t.sig , t.route_concept_id , t.lot_number , t.provider_id , t.visit_occurrence_id , t.visit_detail_id , t.drug_source_value , t.drug_source_concept_id , t.route_source_value , t.dose_unit_source_value FROM {sc}.drug_exposure as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
